item.title: Google Stackdriver Monitoring
item.description: Stackdriver Monitoring provides visibility into the performance, uptime, and overall health of cloud-powered applications. Stackdriver collects metrics, events, and metadata from: Google Cloud Platform Amazon Web Services Hosted uptime probes Application instrumentation Common application components including Cassandra, Nginx, Apache Web Server, Elasticsearch e.t.c Stackdriver ingests that data and generates insights via: Dashboards Charts And alerts. Stackdriver alerting helps you collaborate by integrating with Slack, PagerDuty, HipChat, Campfire, and more.
